oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Johnny "K" Koval interviewing Mario Martin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording is from Johnny "K" Koval (entertainer) interview of Mario Martin (performer) and Danny Ray Martin (performer) for WSM-Am in Nashville, Tennessee. The recording is from an unknown date.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnny Koval; Mario Martin
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Johnny 'K' Koval reflects on Mario Martin's youth and marvels at the fact he is only seventeen -- (01:03) Koval inquires as to the duration of Martin's career, and Martin reveals his performance at the Grand Ole Opry fueled his career -- (03:01) Koval inquires as to "Keep it on the Country Side" -- (03:20) Keep it on the Country Side [excerpt] (Mario Martin) -- (03:29) Koval praises Martin's voice, and both discuss Martin's music video for "Keep it on the Country Side" -- (05:33) Martin introduces Garrett Martin and Garrett reflects on Martin's talents as a country artist -- (06:31) Koval asks Martin about his driving forces, and Koval reflects on what he said to Travis Tritt -- (07:33) Koval accepts a call from an unidentified voice who praises Martin -- (08:30) Koval asks as to Garrett's advice he's give Mario; additionally, Mario introduces "It Takes Alot of Heart" -- (09:09) It Takes Alot of Heart [excerpt] (Mario Martin) -- (09:23) Koval requests some water and asks about his upcoming work -- (10:21) Koval attempts to introduce a caller, and Koval and Martin discuss Martin's school schedule -- (11:48) Koval inquires about the show Martin is doing in Las Vegas, and both discuss Martin's interests -- (13:03) Koval and Martin say their goodbyes -- (13:16) Lou and Larry's Lock and Key radio commercial spot [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Koval, Johnny; Martin, Mario (Vocalist);
